attributes.action: PERSUE AND FINE FOREIGN DRIVERS SPEEDING ON UK ROADS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do foreign trucks and coaches able to break the UK speed limits and escape without punishment. I propose that any vehicle caught breaking our law be refused entry into the UK as a driver unless it can be proved that he or she has suffered similar punishment to a UK driver committing the same offence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
